title: Beefcake - Gym Workout Logger
summary: A simple workout tracker with Wear support. Track progress. View stats. Get fit!
description: A simple workout tracker with Wear support. Track progress. View stats. Get fit!Features  - Android Wear support (no phone at gym required) - Create and manage your own set of exercises and categories - Build multiple workouts and include different set of exercises  - Log your progress for each exercise - Different input types (weight, reps, distance, time) - Create and add new exercises during your workout - Follow-up your completed workouts - See your workouts in a calendar - Statistics - Database Export - Languages supported: English, Chinese Simplified (简体中文), Chinese Traditional (繁體中文), SpanishPro Features - Advanced Statistics - Database import  - Cloud backup - Automatic database backup when finishing workout We know there are several similar apps but we find them either too complex or not very intuitive to use. Our goal was therefore to make Beefcake as simple and intuitive as possible. We have many ideas on improvements and are very open to feedback.Support the Beefcake team - get a Pro subscription or donate a Protein BarPlease give us feedback and rate us in Play! Enjoy!Web Page http://www.beefcakeworkout.com Beefcake Workout community https://plus.google.com/u/0/b/111137396115559210740/communities/108923234995559342575*Used permissions*INTERNET, ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE - used by Google AnalyticsGET_ACCOUNTS - cloud sync (work in progress)WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - export databaseDISABLE_KEYGUARD - disable screen lock (setting) while using Beefcake
descriptionHTML:
A simple workout tracker with Wear support. Track progress. View stats. Get fit!

Features
- Android Wear support (no phone at gym required)
- Create and manage your own set of exercises and categories
- Build multiple workouts and include different set of exercises
- Log your progress for each exercise
- Different input types (weight, reps, distance, time)
- Create and add new exercises during your workout
- Follow-up your completed workouts
- See your workouts in a calendar
- Statistics
- Database Export
- Languages supported: English, Chinese Simplified (简体中文), Chinese Traditional (繁體中文), Spanish

Pro Features
- Advanced Statistics
- Database import
- Cloud backup
- Automatic database backup when finishing workout

We know there are several similar apps but we find them either too complex or not very intuitive to use. Our goal was therefore to make Beefcake as simple and intuitive as possible. We have many ideas on improvements and are very open to feedback.

Support the Beefcake team - get a Pro subscription or donate a Protein Bar

Please give us feedback and rate us in Play! Enjoy!

Web Page http://www.beefcakeworkout.com
Beefcake Workout community https://plus.google.com/u/0/b/111137396115559210740/communities/108923234995559342575

*Used permissions*
INTERNET, ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE - used by Google Analytics
GET_ACCOUNTS - cloud sync (work in progress)
WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - export database
DISABLE_KEYGUARD - disable screen lock (setting) while using Beefcake
comments: I would like to be able to track basic cardio and health statistics. Things like calories burned  and weight. For calories burned, I just want to enter what my treadmill or exercise machine calculates. In other words, I don't need the app to calculate it, I just want to be able to enter it as a statistic for my cardiac routine.
I like this app for Android wear, but I'd like to see icon or draw symbols of the exercise. Thanks a lot
Finally.. Great easy to use app that doesn't confuse you on every move you make. Thanks a million.

Great app Used to be the best workout app on android, but I've since switched to the app 'Progression' which syncs with Google fit and allows you to set a different rest time for each exercise in your routine. This app has become more complicated without adding useful features.
recentChanges: - New: The calendar is back on start screen
- New: Preload sets based on routine (new setting)
- New: Exercise status icon is shown in tab and finish exercise will not throw you back to previous screen
- New: You can now plan workouts again (press a future date in calendar)
- New: Improved UI for Wear watches
- New: Finish Workout button will transition between Add Exercise > Start Workout > Finish Workout
